name: South of Market Community Action Network
description: South of Market Community Action Network is a community organization with a mission to educate, organize and mobilize the low-income immigrant youth and families in SoMa and greater San Francisco. SOMCAN provides direct referral services and support for immigrant families by connecting them to different resources and services.
